gold.user: Admin user requesting all client scopes for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all client scopes available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new client scope with specific attributes.
gold.ideal: Creates a new client scope in the specified realm and returns the created scope details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details for a specific client scope by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the client scope with the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user updating the attributes of an existing client scope.
gold.ideal: Updates the client scope with the specified ID and returns the updated scope details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific client scope by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the client scope with the specified ID and returns a success message.

gold.user: Admin user requesting all client templates for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all client templates available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new client template with specific configurations.
gold.ideal: Creates a new client template in the specified realm and returns the created template details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details for a specific client template by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the client template with the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user updating the attributes of an existing client template.
gold.ideal: Updates the client template with the specified ID and returns the updated template details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific client template by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the client template with the specified ID and returns a success message.
